Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Progress of David Hawkin
Dear Sir,
David Hawkin has an ERA of 2.20 at AA Patriot Games!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Progress of Carlos Acosta
Dear Sir,
Carlos Acosta is hitting the ball well at A Marshall Thundering Herd!
He has an AVG of .386, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Tuesday, 9/2/1983
Subject: Extension?

Florentino Arana



Date: Tuesday, 9/16/1983

Boss,
What about my playing time? Am I not

change, trade me!

Regards,
Armand Romero
